{"step_by_step_thinking": "Before ovulation, the development of granules in a cell is dependent on the stimulation of follicle development. This process is regulated by follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH) secreted by the pituitary gland. FSH stimulates the growth and development of ovarian follicles, which contain the eggs. Therefore, the correct answer is C. FSH.", "answer_choice": "C"}
